file.name: params-for-all.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0"
info:
  title: Params For All Operations
paths:
  /param/{id}:
    parameters:
      - $ref: "#/components/parameters/name"
      - name: id
        schema:
          type: string
        in: path
      - name: special-character
        schema:
          type: string
        in: query
    post:
      description: Empty parameters
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "OK"
    get:
      parameters:
        - name: key
          schema:
            type: string
          in: query
      description: has existing parameters
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "OK"
components:
  parameters:
    name:
      name: name
      schema:
        type: string
      required: false
      in: query

Error: parse: parse spec: /param/{id}: parameters: parse parameter "id": path parameters must be required
